website_summaries.verdict: This versatile tool can adjust from a spotlight to a floodlight with a simple slide of its head.
pros: Highly portable, bright flashlight that charges with USB rather than consumable batteries
Stands up to bangs and scratches in a toolbag
Use on high, low or strobe modes

customer_reviews.title: Love it, at this price
customer_reviews.text: Works as well, and as bright as Streamlight, or Surefire. Charges through the usb port on the side, which might be hard to find for the first time. Battery could be replaced if needed. In my case I have two different flash light from Milwaukee, both use the same batteries, and I have another charging capsule. So One battery is charging while I work. When the flashlight runs out I gust flip the battery with the capsule, and keep on going. Good job Milwaukee.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Trubin

customer_reviews.title: 4 months broken.  We bought another from another site and also broken
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Many complaints of them not working in 3-4 months. We used it for 4 months. Works great until they stop working. Too expensive to throw away your money. We even tried replacing the $20 battery and still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Deb A

customer_reviews.title: I expect more from Milwuakee
customer_reviews.text: This light has a good build quality, but I've owned several of these and there are shortcomings I would not expect from Milwaukee. The batteries for these lights are inadequate, as they start flashing (an indication that the battery is weak) after only a few minutes of run time. As a professional, run time is paramount. The spot/flood telescoping feature sticks, and does not stay put either. If you buy this light, lower your expectations, as it is not the typical Milwaukee product.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy D

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. So incredibly disappointed. He can't use it for work. The thing that slides to focus doesn't stay because of a vacuum seal. The only way to get the focus to stay is if you unscrew the battery compartment, which defies the purpose of it being dust or waterproof. And even after that, the spot light is absolutely crap. Not a spot light at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amber J

customer_reviews.title: nice not to always have to buy batteries
customer_reviews.text: I do inspections of buildings. This is the brightest flashlight I've found and it's not too big. Also, nice not to always have to buy batteries. Belt clip works pretty well too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Guenther

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light!
customer_reviews.text: Tough little light, I keep it in my tool bag and it gets penned by other heavy tools and doesn’t suffer any damage, ready to use when you want to and the light is clear and has little to no glare. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Luziano Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Nice & bright.  Feels really well made.
customer_reviews.text: Little bigger than what the pictures suggest but it's not huge. Nice size and hefty feeling. Feels like it'll last. lights up an entire room as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Acacia & Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Tough, Short
customer_reviews.text: I use this light almost daily. Consistently bright. It has two brightness levels. Flashes when turned on if battery needs charging. No surprises. Charges in about an hour with Apple iPad charger. I’ve dropped it a few times on a concrete floor from waist level and still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if wearing on your belt clip is very cheap
customer_reviews.text: This item is designed very poorly. I am a Milwaukee electrician have all know walkie tools but the belt clip on this particular item is very cheap and not worth the money I had the flashlight for a week to a week and a 1/2 and I knew I was gonna have problems dropping it off my belt clip sure enough when I order a holster for it lost it the day before my flashlight was gone.
customer_reviews.author: israel santoya

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a flashlight like this for awhile. Rechargeable is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Taft

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Battery will not hold a charge from brand new. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Edward F.

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee flash light
customer_reviews.text: Great item, clips to my pocket or belt when i need my hands. Nice and bright for seeing in not so well light areas
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super Brite Light
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee makes great products, the light is bright, USB Charging, Awesome product, great customer service, Fast Shipping Would Recommend this product to anyone who need a quality light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Wish the battery lasted longer but otherwise a great light.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and the USB charging is fast. Had one now for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Never  in the dark with this light
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect I work inside of aircraft Never experience a dark moment
customer_reviews.author: padden91

customer_reviews.title: Brightness is great but beware Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: The battery seems to get weak with intermittent use in a 1 hour period
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super bright light needs back up battery
customer_reviews.text: I like the light very bright but battery only lasts a couple hours
customer_reviews.author: Eric h.

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn’t last long enough to complete a task. I charge it every night. It’s dead long before my other rechargeable lights are
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size rechargeable service flashlight
customer_reviews.text: The battery life could be longer but it’s bright so I get it ... it’s also made well and can take multiple drops. Pretty much water proof. Great flashlight !
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carlini jr

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a week. Will not charge. Makes excellent beating stick or paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Battery life could be longer but it's easy enough to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great. As a security officer a night I need to see all around me. This product does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa Rosenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: This light is pretty durable and is a great alternative to the streamlight stinger. I've accidentally dropped this a few times from above 10ft and still on good shape. Always have this light on me. Used it every day for about 7 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Guillen Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very bright with true color
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good flashlight, well worth every penny. The charge lasts thru out two days of hard use. I am going to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Extreme duty? More like extreme waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Was working fine then it would just shut off and wont charge! Other dislikes... The focus when pushed or pulled does not stay in complete extended position. Also its really annoying when the battery goes low the light blinks.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Poor internal electronics
customer_reviews.text: While this flashlight us BRIGHT it lacks durability. The built in charger failed on my 1st one within 3 months. Kudos to Milwaukee for upholding its warranty. Unfortunately my replacement has suffered the same fate within 4 months. I just cannot purchase another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: K. Renfrow

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The light is decent quality. The batteries do not last long at all. Would be nice if you could change the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: b johnson

customer_reviews.title: Piece of CRAP
customer_reviews.text: We finally found out where the micro usb port is for recharging, after looking online. But, we cannot access the port! Cannot open the cap of the light. Perhaps with a pair of vice grips. Returning to store (did not purchase from Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Gary H Holabird

product_meta.title: Milwaukee 2110-21 700-Lumen LED Rechargeable Aluminum Flashlight
product_meta.description: EXTREME OUTPUT. BUILT FOR THE TOUGHEST CONDITIONS. Powered by REDLITHIUM USB, the Milwaukee USB Rechargeable 700L Flashlight delivers 700-Lumens of TRUEVIEW High Definition output and is capable of all-day runtime, over 2, 000 recharges and 3X faster charging via USB. Waterproof and dustproof, this flashlight can withstand submersion up to 1M and the toughest conditions on and off the jobsite. A sliding head lets users adjust their beam pattern from spot to flood with up to 155 m beam distance. The light includes High, Low and Strobe output modes and up-to 16 hours of runtime.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
